Title: Royston Vasey and the Monster from Hell
Plot: Roysten Vasey is quarantined as the nosebleed epidemic claims a distinguished victim. The Legz Akimbo Theatre Group comes to town, and there is a wedding at the local shop.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Writer: Jeremy Dyson, Mark Gatiss, Steve Pemberton, Reece Sh
